TEXT.TITLE: AIR FORCE EXERCISES OPTION FOR AAR <AIR> ORDER
TEXT.BODY: AAR Corp said that the U.S. Air force exercised an option valued at about eight mln dlrs with its Brooks and Perkins Cadillac manufacturing subsidiary in Michigan, for cargo pallet maintenence and overhaul. Reuter
